archimate:Assessment.name: TEMA Fails due to leadership depriorization of project and lack of resourcing
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
TEMA reasons for failing are well documented, but do not stem from a change in demands or a failure in design.
Amongst other reasons the TEMA plan did not succeed - Lack of resourcing - Constant changing of the resources that TEMA did have - Deprioritization of the project. - Project management
